comment: "I was a staff writer for Autostraddle for years and was rarely paid. I think they might be improving this policy, but I'm not sure at what rate, and by the time I finished their finances were well past the point when they should have been paying writers. I want to warn other prospective writers, but want to remain anonymous so as not to ruin professional relationships."
